message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I think it's a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a competitive price. While I value your interest, $10,000 is significantly below its worth. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $11,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,500 for the product.
